analysis.original_question:
Find all VPN SSL ranges that can reach critical devices (criticality level 2.0).
Show me the network paths from VPN SSL ranges to critical infrastructure.
Include all devices with criticality level 2.0 and their categories.
Limit to 50 paths.

meta.original_query: MATCH (vpn:VPN_SSL)-[:CONNECTS*]->(device:Device) WHERE device.criticality = 2.0 OPTIONAL MATCH (device)-[:BELONGS_TO]->(category:Category) RETURN vpn, device, category LIMIT 50
